fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Remember who you were, Transforming into a role you had in a previous game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Any roles you remember will be copied directly from that game, ignoring any changes made to the role after that game.
- If you Copy a role from a game you have won, You must also survive in order to win.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Win (And survive depending on your attributes) as a role you remembered.
